name: Technology Support
description: Template for technology/SaaS support cases including technical issues, account management, and feature requests

workflow_steps: 2. Create custom fields using cases_create_field for each field in customFields
3. Create case layout using cases_create_layout with technology_layout template
4. Create cases using create_case with template_id and field mappings
critical_notes: Severity field is required - must be set during case creation
Environment field should be populated for technical issues
Steps to Reproduce field is crucial for bug reports
Product Name and Version help with proper routing

customFields.name: Steps to Reproduce
customFields.example: 1. Login to dashboard 2. Click Reports 3. Select date range 4. Error appears

customFields.name: Resolution Notes
customFields.example: Updated API endpoint configuration and cleared cache

fullCase.title: API Integration Timeout Error
fullCase.steps_to_reproduce: 1. Make API call to /sync endpoint 2. Wait 30 seconds 3. Timeout error occurs
